name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Samurai Katana Neon City Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Step into a neon-lit samurai world! Download now for breathtaking live wallpapers and a futuristic new tab experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your browser with the Samurai Katana Neon City Live Wallpaper extension! Each new tab immerses you in a stunning cyberpunk-inspired cityscape, blending the timeless elegance of samurai with the vibrant glow of neon lights.

Key Features:
Dynamic Neon Samurai Wallpaper: Enjoy high-quality animated backgrounds featuring a katana-wielding samurai in a futuristic neon city.
Clock & Date Display: Stay organized with a sleek clock and date layout that complements the cyberpunk aesthetic.
Quick Access Links: Easily navigate to your favorite sites with customizable shortcuts.
Additional Options: Discover more extensions, view privacy policies, or uninstall effortlessly.
Perfect for fans of samurai lore, cyberpunk aesthetics, and epic visual themes, this extension brings a unique fusion of tradition and futurism to your browser.

Download now and experience the Samurai Katana Neon City every time you open a new tab!
